name: Flint
description: You can create an Ekip which won't give you bonus stat but count in the number of part of your set. It breaks after 1 fight.

name: Dean
description: You can take the 2 rewards of a Contract

name: Cassidy
description: take 1 random card in your opponent hand.

name: Thomas
description: You can buy in the shop while it's your opponent turn

name: Lin
description: When you draw a Contract or Challenge and it doesn't please you, you can put it back underneath the pile and draw another.
